header_text: You work in a large office with your supervisors. One morning you have to call your father and discuss an important matter. Everyone else is working quietly, and several colleagues look up and seem annoyed.

elements.Text: Were others judging you negatively because you called your father from work?

elements.name: You work in a large office with your supervisors. One morning you have to call your father and discuss an important matter. Everyone else is working quietly, and several colleagues look up and seem annoyed._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
